actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on crosslinked polyvinylbenzyltrimethylammonuium chloride (cholestyramine resin USP).

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on cross-linked polyvinyl benzyltrimethylammonium chloride (cholestyramine resin USP).

titles.title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on crosslinked polyvinylbenzyltrimethylammonuium chloride (cholestyramine resin USP).
